PrintingInformation.PrintQuality: High-quality prints with consistent color fidelity throughout the entire print run

ColorMatching.Note: Exact color matching with existing business cards is not guaranteed
ColorMatching.Details: Color output may differ depending on printing equipment and supplier

ScreenVsPrint.Description: Color discrepancies between computer screen and final printed product may occur
ScreenVsPrint.Policy: No reprints at our expense if the issue is related to color variations

PantoneColors.Handling: Pantone colors will be converted to CMYK colors automatically
PantoneColors.Policy: Pantone colors cannot be printed directly
